SELECT ROWNUM RN , Y.LIC_GRP_ID AS LIC_GRP_ID , Y.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_GRP_ID , Y.PRJ_ID AS PRJ_ID , Y.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID , Y.BAD_ID AS BAD_ID , Y.BAD_NUM AS BAD_NUM , Y.BAD_TITLE AS BAD_TITLE , Y.BAD_USR_ID AS BAD_USR_ID , Y.BAD_USR_NM AS BAD_USR_NM , Y.BAD_USR_IMG_ID AS BAD_USR_IMG_ID , Y.BAD_WTDTM AS BAD_WTDTM , Y.BAD_NTC_TYPE AS BAD_NTC_TYPE , Y.BAD_NTC_CHECK AS BAD_NTC_CHECK , Y.BAD_CMT_YN AS BAD_CMT_YN , Y.BAD_HIT AS BAD_HIT , Y.BAD_PW AS BAD_PW , Y.ATCH_FILE_ID AS ATCH_FILE_ID , ( SELECT MIN(B.FILE_SN) AS FILE_SN FROM COMTNFILEDETAIL B WHERE 1 = 1 AND Y.ATCH_FILE_ID = B.ATCH_FILE_ID ) AS FILE_SN , ( SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(COUNT(B.FILE_SN), 0 )) AS FILE_CNT FROM COMTNFILEDETAIL B WHERE 1 = 1 AND Y.ATCH_FILE_ID = B.ATCH_FILE_ID ) AS BAD_FILE_CNT , ( SELECT TO_CHAR((NVL(SUM(B.FILE_SIZE)/(1024*1024), 0))) AS FILE_SIZE FROM COMTNFILEDETAIL B WHERE 1 = 1 AND Y.ATCH_FILE_ID = B.ATCH_FILE_ID GROUP BY B.ATCH_FILE_ID ) AS BAD_FILE_SIZE , ( SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(COUNT(C.BAD_CMT_ID), 0 )) AS CMT_CNT FROM BAD1100 C WHERE 1 = 1 AND Y.LIC_GRP_ID = C.LIC_GRP_ID AND Y.MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID AND Y.BAD_ID = C.BAD_ID ) AS BAD_CMT_CNT , Y.DEL_CD AS DEL_CD , X.STM_NTC_YN_CD AS STM_NTC_YN_CD , X.STM_PW_YN_CD AS STM_PW_YN_CD , X.STM_CMT_YN_CD AS STM_CMT_YN_CD , X.STM_TAG_YN_CD AS STM_TAG_YN_CD , X.STM_FILE_CNT AS STM_FILE_CNT , X.STM_FILE_STRG/(1024*1024) AS STM_FILE_STRG FROM (
SELECT C.* , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(C.BAD_USR_ID, 1) AS BAD_USR_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(C.BAD_USR_ID, 6) AS BAD_USR_IMG_ID , '01' AS BAD_NTC_CHECK FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM BAD_NUM , B.* FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID AS LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID AS PRJ_ID , A.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID , A.BAD_ID AS BAD_ID , A.BAD_TITLE AS BAD_TITLE , A.BAD_CONTENT AS BAD_CONTENT , A.BAD_USR_ID AS BAD_USR_ID , TO_CHAR(A.BAD_WTDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS BAD_WTDTM , A.BAD_NTC_TYPE AS BAD_NTC_TYPE , NVL2( A.BAD_NTC_STDTM, TO_CHAR(A.BAD_NTC_STDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '' ) AS BAD_NTC_STDTM , NVL2( A.BAD_NTC_EDDTM, TO_CHAR(A.BAD_NTC_EDDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '' ) AS BAD_NTC_EDDTM , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MOMENT , TO_CHAR(A.BAD_HIT) AS BAD_HIT , A.BAD_CMT_YN AS BAD_CMT_YN , NVL2(A.BAD_PW, '01', '02') AS BAD_PW , A.ATCH_FILE_ID AS ATCH_FILE_ID , A.DEL_CD AS DEL_CD FROM BAD1000 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId# ORDER BY BAD_ID ASC ) B WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY BAD_NUM DESC ) C WHERE 1 = 1 AND C.BAD_NTC_TYPE = '03' OR ( C.BAD_NTC_TYPE = '02' AND C.MOMENT BETWEEN C.BAD_NTC_STDTM AND C.BAD_NTC_EDDTM )
AND C.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId#
AND C.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
UNION ALL
SELECT G.* , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(G.BAD_USR_ID, 1) AS BAD_USR_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(G.BAD_USR_ID, 6) AS BAD_USR_IMG_ID , '02' AS BAD_NTC_CHECK FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM BAD_NUM , F.* FROM ( SELECT E.LIC_GRP_ID AS LIC_GRP_ID , E.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_GRP_ID , E.PRJ_ID AS PRJ_ID , E.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID , E.BAD_ID AS BAD_ID , E.BAD_TITLE AS BAD_TITLE , E.BAD_CONTENT AS BAD_CONTENT , E.BAD_USR_ID AS BAD_USR_ID , TO_CHAR(E.BAD_WTDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS BAD_WTDTM , E.BAD_NTC_TYPE AS BAD_NTC_TYPE , NVL2( E.BAD_NTC_STDTM, TO_CHAR(E.BAD_NTC_STDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '' ) AS BAD_NTC_STDTM , NVL2( E.BAD_NTC_EDDTM, TO_CHAR(E.BAD_NTC_EDDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '' ) AS BAD_NTC_EDDTM , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MOMENT , TO_CHAR(E.BAD_HIT) AS BAD_HIT , E.BAD_CMT_YN AS BAD_CMT_YN , NVL2(E.BAD_PW, '01', '02') AS BAD_PW , E.ATCH_FILE_ID AS ATCH_FILE_ID , E.DEL_CD AS DEL_CD FROM BAD1000 E WHERE 1 = 1 AND E.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND E.MENU_ID = #menuId# ORDER BY BAD_ID ASC ) F WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY BAD_NUM DESC ) G WHERE 1 = 1
AND G.BAD_NTC_TYPE = '01' OR ( G.BAD_NTC_TYPE = '02' AND G.MOMENT < G.BAD_NTC_STDTM ) OR ( G.BAD_NTC_TYPE = '02' AND G.MOMENT > G.BAD_NTC_EDDTM )
AND G.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId#
AND G.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
) Y LEFT JOIN STM2100 X ON ( Y.MENU_ID = X.MENU_ID AND X.USE_CD = '01') WHERE 1 = 1
AND Y.DEL_CD = '02'
AND Y.DEL_CD = '02'
AND Y.DEL_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND Y.BAD_NTC_CHECK = #searchTargetData#
AND ( Y.BAD_USR_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%' OR Y.BAD_USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%' )
AND Y.BAD_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(Y.BAD_CONTENT, #searchTargetData#) > 0
AND Y.BAD_WTDTM BETWEEN TO_DATE(#searchStartDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#searchEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND EXISTS ( SELECT H.BAD_ID FROM BAD1100 H WHERE 1 = 1 AND Y.BAD_ID = H.BAD_ID AND H.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND H.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId#
AND H.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND H.BAD_CMT_CONTENT LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%' )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT J.BAD_ID FROM BAD1010 J INNER JOIN ( SELECT I.TAG_ID AS TAG_ID FROM TAG1000 I WHERE 1 = 1 AND I.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND I.TAG_NM LIKE '%'|| TRIM(#searchTargetData#) ||'%' ) K ON ( J.TAG_ID = K.TAG_ID ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND J.BAD_ID = Y.BAD_ID AND J.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND J.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId#
AND J.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
)

SELECT A.BAD_ID AS BAD_ID FROM BAD1000 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId#
AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId# AND A.BAD_ID = #badId# AND A.DEL_CD = '02' AND A.BAD_PW = #badPw#

SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID AS LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID AS PRJ_ID , A.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID , A.BAD_ID AS BAD_ID , A.BAD_TITLE AS BAD_TITLE , A.BAD_CONTENT AS BAD_CONTENT , A.BAD_USR_ID AS BAD_USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.BAD_USR_ID, 1) AS BAD_USR_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.BAD_USR_ID, 6) AS BAD_USR_IMG_ID , TO_CHAR(A.BAD_WTDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS BAD_WTDTM , NVL2(( SELECT B.BAD_ID FROM BAD1000 B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = B.PRJ_GRP_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND A.BAD_ID = B.BAD_ID AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(B.BAD_NTC_STDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(B.BAD_NTC_EDDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ), '01', '02') AS BAD_NTC_CHECK , A.BAD_NTC_TYPE AS BAD_NTC_TYPE , TO_CHAR(NVL(A.BAD_NTC_STDTM, SYSDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BAD_NTC_STDTM , TO_CHAR(NVL(A.BAD_NTC_EDDTM, SYSDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BAD_NTC_EDDTM , A.BAD_HIT AS BAD_HIT , A.BAD_PW AS BAD_PW , NVL(A.DEL_CD, '02') AS DEL_CD , A.BAD_CMT_YN AS BAD_CMT_YN , A.ATCH_FILE_ID AS ATCH_FILE_ID , A.FILE_SN AS FILE_SN , ( SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(COUNT(B.BAD_CMT_ID), 0 )) AS CMT_CNT FROM BAD1100 B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND A.BAD_ID = B.BAD_ID
AND B.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId#
AND B.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
) AS BAD_CMT_CNT FROM BAD1000 A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.DEL_CD = '02'
AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId#
AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId# AND A.BAD_ID = #badId#

SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID AS LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID AS PRJ_ID , A.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID , A.BAD_ID AS BAD_ID , A.BAD_USR_ID AS USR_ID , B.USR_NM AS USR_NM , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(A.LIC_GRP_ID, 'ADM00007', B.USR_POSITION_CD, 1) AS USR_POSITION_NM , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(A.LIC_GRP_ID, 'ADM00008', B.USR_DUTY_CD, 1) AS USR_DUTY_NM , SF_STM6000_DEPT_NM(A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.BAD_USR_ID, 6) AS USR_DEPT_NM , A.REG_DTM AS REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID AS REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP AS REG_USR_IP FROM BAD1000 A JOIN STM3000 B ON A.BAD_USR_ID = B.USR_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId#
AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId# AND A.BAD_ID = #badId#

SELECT A.BAD_ID AS BAD_ID , A.TAG_ID AS TAG_ID FROM BAD1010 A LEFT JOIN TAG1000 B ON A.TAG_ID = B.TAG_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #stmDsId#
AND A.PRJ_ID = #stmDsId#
AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId#
SELECT A.TAG_ID AS TAG_ID FROM BAD1010 A LEFT JOIN TAG1000 B ON A.TAG_ID = B.TAG_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId# AND A.BAD_ID = #badId#
delete: DELETE FROM BAD1010 WHERE 1 = 1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND MENU_ID = #menuId# AND BAD_ID = #badId#
insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(BAD_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(BAD_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'BAD' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_BAD_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(BAD_ID) AS BAD_ID FROM BAD1000 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND MENU_ID = #menuId# AND BAD_ID LIKE 'BAD' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' ) WHERE 1 = 1
INSERT INTO BAD1000 ( LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_GRP_ID , PRJ_ID , MENU_ID , BAD_ID , BAD_TITLE , BAD_CONTENT , BAD_USR_ID , BAD_HIT , BAD_WTDTM , BAD_NTC_TYPE , BAD_NTC_STDTM , BAD_NTC_EDDTM , BAD_PW , BAD_CMT_YN , ATCH_FILE_ID , FILE_SN , DEL_CD , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId# , #prjGrpId# , #prjId# , #menuId# , #newBadId# , #badTitle# , #badContent# , #usrId# , 0 , SYSDATE
, #badNtcType#
, '01'
, #badNtcStdtm#
, NULL
, #badNtcEddtm#
, NULL
, #badPw# , #badCmtYn# , #atchFileId# , #fileSn# , '02' , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #modifyUsrId# , #modifyUsrIp# )

INSERT INTO BAD1010 ( LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_GRP_ID , PRJ_ID , MENU_ID , BAD_ID , TAG_ID , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId# , #prjGrpId# , #prjId# , #menuId# , #badId# , #tagId# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #modifyUsrId# , #modifyUsrIp# )
update:
UPDATE BAD1000 SET BAD_HIT = BAD_HIT + 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND PRJ_GRP_ID = #stmDsId#
AND PRJ_ID = #stmDsId#
AND MENU_ID = #menuId# AND BAD_ID = #badId#

UPDATE BAD1000 SET BAD_TITLE = #badTitle# , BAD_CONTENT = #badContent#
, BAD_NTC_TYPE = #badNtcType#
, BAD_NTC_TYPE = '01'
, BAD_NTC_STDTM = #badNtcStdtm#
, BAD_NTC_STDTM = NULL
, BAD_NTC_EDDTM = #badNtcEddtm#
, BAD_NTC_EDDTM = NULL
, BAD_PW = #badPw#
, BAD_PW = NULL
, BAD_PW = NULL
, BAD_CMT_YN = #badCmtYn# , ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId# , FILE_SN = #fileSn# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1 = 1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND PRJ_GRP_ID = #stmDsId#
AND PRJ_ID = #stmDsId#
AND MENU_ID = #menuId# AND BAD_ID = #badId#

UPDATE BAD1000 SET DEL_CD = '01' , DEL_TYPE_CD = #delTypeCd# , DEL_TXT = #delTxt# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1 = 1 AND DEL_CD = '02' AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND PRJ_GRP_ID = #stmDsId#
AND PRJ_ID = #stmDsId#
AND MENU_ID = #menuId# AND BAD_ID = #badId#

UPDATE BAD1000 SET DEL_CD = '02' , DEL_TYPE_CD = NULL , DEL_TXT = NULL , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1 = 1 AND DEL_CD = '01' AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND PRJ_GRP_ID = #stmDsId#
AND PRJ_ID = #stmDsId#
AND MENU_ID = #menuId# AND BAD_ID = #badId#
select: SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(COUNT(A.BAD_ID), 0)) AS CNT FROM BAD1000 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId# AND A.DEL_CD = '02' AND ( A.BAD_NTC_TYPE = '03' OR ( A.BAD_NTC_TYPE = '02' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(A.BAD_NTC_STDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(A.BAD_NTC_EDDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) )

SELECT C.BAD_NTC_STDTM AS BAD_NTC_STDTM , C.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_GRP_ID , C.PRJ_ID AS PRJ_ID , C.BAD_ID AS BAD_ID FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RN , B.BAD_NTC_STDTM AS BAD_NTC_STDTM , B.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_GRP_ID , B.PRJ_ID AS PRJ_ID , B.BAD_ID AS BAD_ID FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(A.BAD_NTC_STDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BAD_NTC_STDTM , A.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID AS PRJ_ID , A.BAD_ID AS BAD_ID FROM BAD1000 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId# AND A.DEL_CD = '02' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(A.BAD_NTC_STDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(A.BAD_NTC_EDDTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY BAD_NTC_STDTM DESC, BAD_ID DESC ) B ORDER BY RN ASC ) C WHERE 1 = 1 AND C.RN BETWEEN 0 AND 1

SELECT C.BAD_CNT_ALL AS BAD_CNT_ALL , D.BAD_CNT_DEL AS BAD_CNT_DEL FROM ( SELECT COUNT(A.BAD_ID) AS BAD_CNT_ALL FROM BAD1000 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId# ) C, ( SELECT COUNT(B.BAD_ID) AS BAD_CNT_DEL FROM BAD1000 B WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.DEL_CD = '01' AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND B.MENU_ID = #menuId# ) D WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT ROWNUM RE_RN , C.RN AS RN , C.BAD_ID AS BAD_ID , C.BAD_HIT AS BAD_HIT , C.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_GRP_ID , C.PRJ_ID AS PRJ_ID FROM ( SELECT B.RN AS RN , B.BAD_ID AS BAD_ID , B.BAD_HIT AS BAD_HIT , B.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_GRP_ID , B.PRJ_ID AS PRJ_ID FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN , A.BAD_ID AS BAD_ID , A.BAD_HIT AS BAD_HIT , A.PRJ_GRP_ID AS PRJ_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID AS PRJ_ID FROM BAD1000 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.DEL_CD = '02' AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId# ORDER BY BAD_ID DESC ) B ORDER BY BAD_HIT DESC ) C WHERE 1 = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(COUNT(A.BAD_ID), 0)) AS CNT FROM BAD1000 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.DEL_CD = '02' AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId# AND (A.BAD_PW IS NOT NULL OR A.BAD_PW != '')

SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(D.FILE_TOTAL_CNT),0)) AS FILE_TOTAL_CNT , TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(D.FILE_TOTAL_SIZE),0)) AS FILE_TOTAL_SIZE FROM ( SELECT A.ATCH_FILE_ID AS ATCH_FILE_ID , NVL(C.FILE_SN, 0) AS FILE_TOTAL_CNT , NVL(C.FILE_SIZE, 0) AS FILE_TOTAL_SIZE FROM BAD1000 A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.ATCH_FILE_ID AS ATCH_FILE_ID , COUNT(NVL(B.FILE_SN,0)) AS FILE_SN , SUM(NVL(B.FILE_SIZE,0)) AS FILE_SIZE FROM COMTNFILEDETAIL B WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY B.ATCH_FILE_ID ) C ON A.ATCH_FILE_ID = C.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.MENU_ID = #menuId# ) D
